docs.summary: Adds schedule item to the draft schedule. Draft items are not publicly available unless published.
Deletes schedule item from draft schedule.

Clears all changes to the draft schedule.
(Does not affect the published schedule.)
Retrieves a list of up to 100 schedule items, with basic filter support.

Retrieves a list of up to 100 schedule items, given the provided [paging](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination), [filtering](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort#wix-events_wix-events_filter-and-sort_list-schedule-items).
description: - All results are for one specific business, resolved from the request context.
- `cursorPaging` - not supported, use offset pagination instead.
- When filter is not specified, returns all schedule items that caller is authorized to read.
- When sorting is not specified, defaults to `time_slot.start` and `time_slot.end` in `ASC` order.

docs.summary: Adjusts time of all draft schedule items (per event).

Updates existing schedule item.
All modifications are performed on a draft schedule, even if schedule item has already been published.

examples.title: updateScheduleItem example
body: const result = await schedule.updateScheduleItem(itemId, eventId, options);

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: limit
members.doc:
Deprecated, use `paging`.
Number of items to load per page. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: offset
members.doc:
Deprecated, use `paging`.
Number of items to skip. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: paging
members.doc:
Pointer to page of results using offset.
See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: startingBefore
members.doc: Filters schedule items starting before specified point in time. Non-inclusive.

members.name: startingFrom
members.doc: Filters schedule items starting on or after specified point in time. Inclusive.

members.name: state
members.doc:
Schedule item state filter.
Defaults to `[PUBLISHED, VISIBLE]` when no filters are specified.
If neither `PUBLISHED` nor `DRAFT` are specified, assumes `PUBLISHED`, for example: `[HIDDEN]` becomes `[HIDDEN, PUBLISHED]`.
If neither `VISIBLE` nor `HIDDEN` are specified, assumes `VISIBLE`, for example: `[DRAFT]` becomes `[DRAFT, VISIBLE]`.

members.name: limit
members.doc:
Deprecated, use `paging`.
Number of items to load per page. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: offset
members.doc:
Deprecated, use `paging`.
Number of items to skip. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: paging
members.doc:
Pointer to page of results using offset.
See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: startingBefore
members.doc: Filters schedule items starting before specified point in time. Non-inclusive.

members.name: startingFrom
members.doc: Filters schedule items starting on or after specified point in time. Inclusive.

members.name: state
members.doc:
Schedule item state filter.
Defaults to `[PUBLISHED, VISIBLE]` when no filters are specified.
If neither `PUBLISHED` nor `DRAFT` are specified, assumes `PUBLISHED`, for example: `[HIDDEN]` becomes `[HIDDEN, PUBLISHED]`.
If neither `VISIBLE` nor `HIDDEN` are specified, assumes `VISIBLE`, for example: `[DRAFT]` becomes `[DRAFT, VISIBLE]`.

members.name: draftNotPublished
members.doc:
Whether there are draft changes which have not been published yet.
Returned only when filtering by single `event_id` with `WIX_EVENTS.MANAGE_AGENDA` permission.

members.name: total
members.doc:
Deprecated, use `paging_metadata.total`.
Total schedule items matching the given filters.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load per page.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: paging
members.doc:
Pointer to page of results using offset.
See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the form [{"fieldName":"sortField1"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","direction":"DESC"}]
See [supported fields](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort#wix-events_wix-events_filter-and-sort_list-query-events).

members.name: paging
members.doc:
Pointer to page of results using offset.
See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: timeSlotOffset
members.doc: Offset added or subtracted from schedule item start & end times.

members.name: timeZoneId
members.doc: Time zone ID in TZ database format, e.g., `EST`, `America/Los_Angeles`.

members.name: timeSlotOffset
members.doc: Offset added or subtracted from schedule item start & end times.

members.name: timeZoneId
members.doc: Time zone ID in TZ database format, e.g., `EST`, `America/Los_Angeles`.

members.name: description
members.doc: Rich-text content displayed in Wix UI when viewing schedule item details (HTML).

members.name: hidden
members.doc: Whether schedule item is hidden from guests.

members.name: stageName
members.doc: Stage or room name in which session takes place.

members.name: tags
members.doc: Tags are used to organize schedule items by assigning them to a general theme or field of study.

members.name: timeSlot
members.doc: Time slot of an schedule item.

description: Schedule item describes the schedule within an event. Each event may contain multiple schedule items.

members.name: description
members.doc: Rich-text content displayed in Wix UI when viewing schedule item details (HTML).

members.name: hidden
members.doc: Whether schedule item is hidden from guests.

members.name: stageName
members.doc: Stage or room name in which session takes place.

members.name: tags
members.doc: Tags are used to organize schedule items by assigning them to a general theme or field of study.

description: Schedule item describes the schedule within an event. Each event may contain multiple schedule items.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by

members.name: timeZoneId
members.doc:
Time zone ID in TZ database format, e.g., `EST`, `America/Los_Angeles`.
Defaults to `Etc/UTC` when not set.

description: Time interval on the timeline between two points in time.

members.name: fields
members.doc:
Set of field paths to update.
When fields are empty, request is interpreted as full update.
Behavior follows [google.protobuf.FieldMask](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/reference/google.protobuf#google.protobuf.FieldMask) semantics.

members.name: fields
members.doc:
Set of field paths to update.
When fields are empty, request is interpreted as full update.
Behavior follows [google.protobuf.FieldMask](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/reference/google.protobuf#google.protobuf.FieldMask) semantics.
